website_summaries.verdict: Multiple-use and leather case design that differs quite a bit from other smartphone case options.
pros: Leather case provides a stylish look, while also providing slots for credit cards, cash, or a driver's license
Will fold out to a horizontal stand to support the phone
Cutouts are in just the right spots
cons: Case may cover parts of the phone's screen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My phone fell out of my purse and under my SUV. I rolled backward to find it . . . And ran over the phone. No cracked screen. . . Only marks on the case. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ruoss

customer_reviews.title: Great but Questionable Durability
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this wallet case for a few weeks, and this is the first wallet case I've ever had for any phone but I LOVE it. The only problem I've run into so far though is it seems like there are strands coming out of the main card holder (pictures attached). Otherwise, it's a great wallet case, it does what it needs to, and I just hope it holds up for a good while!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better awful
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty dangerous for my phone. It is a lot more bulky than expected and with cards in the case it makes your phone entirely unpleasant to hold. Further, the cards in the wallet slots are slightly tilted and scratched the heck out of my screen protector. The latch is also entirely cumbersome and very rigid making it hard to fold back when the front flap is open. I would not recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lang

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my Wife's Samsung G8 plus. It worked as expected. Her credit cards and ID are well accommodated. The phone is protected by a rubber case that hugs the phone in place, while it is affixed to the case. My only issue is that she wished the case has a small strap that could be held around the wrist if you don't want to hold the phone in your hand. Over all this is a great product. Improve the wrist strap and it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kempes C.

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but has a weak magnet to secure cover.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to protect my screen after I cracked it, and it works fairly well for that, but like in other reviews, the magnet is not sufficient for it to stay closed if the phone is dropped; it just opens up. But, if it is in your pocket, it works fine, holds my credit cards securely, and props up nicely while watching a video. I have a liquid screen protector and this hasn't affected it, so it fits nice and snug. Really, the only problem or concern is the weak magnet, which is a big problem if it's dropped and the cover opens.
customer_reviews.author: Redcloudvapor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have several cards in the slots and it still closes nicely. All the features on my Samsung S8 Plus are perfectly accessible, including the camera. It took me a few tries to be able to close it without activating the touch screen but that was user error. Once I became accustomed to using it I have had no problems. The only thing that isn't perfect is the bill portion. Money clearly shows upon opening, it's not easy to remove or to put in. All in all, I don't know how I got along without this. Great organization!
customer_reviews.author: Leann Bosquez

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea of this case- Update review stay away from the case
customer_reviews.text: Update. After a year now I see screen burn in of the left edge of the screen caused by the pressing of the white stitches of the case. Stay away from this case, throwing mine away today. I liked the idea of this case. Didn't want to carry a,wallet anymore but going to need to go back to a wallet again. My phone screen has scratches on surface. Edges of my cards seemed pressed on screen, affecting colors on the screen. I don't have many cards (just credit card and debit).
customer_reviews.author: Red Hood WiTH Axe

customer_reviews.title: Oh, my! I was actually able to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh, my! I was actually able to get rid of my wallet! That is one less thing for me to keep track of. The case is quite protective, the magnet actually works to keep the case closed. Very impressive. The stand feature works well, too. The only thing I have against it is that I can't mount it in my "universal" mount in my car because of the way it folds. Oh, one suggestion, since the magnet also works when you open it to help the cover cling to the back: Cut a camera hole in the cover as well so I don't have to open it to take a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McLean

customer_reviews.title: Taking pictures is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Even with only three cards, the case wants to pop open. When you open the case use the phone you cannot use the camera if the case is flipped around to the back so taking pictures is extremely awkward because the front has to hang open. It is a decent case for when my family goes to Disney and I want to bring my ID and debit card without my wallet, but I miss a lot of picture opportunities. If I could go back I would have bought a different case.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Young

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Card slots ripped after 4 days. Wouldnt reccommend if you need to hold more than 1 card per slot.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Maris

customer_reviews.title: ... classier-looking than some bulky hard plastic shell that looks like it wouldn't be out of place in a combat ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a cell phone case that's a little classier-looking than some bulky hard plastic shell that looks like it wouldn't be out of place in a combat zone, this is the case for you. Leather Folio with slots for three of your most important cards, magnetic clasp, and, the case is designed to set up "kick stand" style so you can stream videos or other media content. Finally, all this in a price point that makes it a virtual steal!
customer_reviews.author: bud

customer_reviews.title: Good until it gets some wear and TEAR
customer_reviews.text: It was great at the beginning, not surprisingly that didn't last. The leather started getting weak and my cards would fall out from time to time, now it's ripping as well so the cards have a new way to fall out. Update: I purchased another one after the 1st one fell apart after one year. I can tell that this one will probably end up doing the same thing as the 1st one
customer_reviews.author: CheeseheadED

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this wallet case. My phone is secure so no worrying about dropping it. The leather is soft and durable. It easily holds my driver's license, 3 credit cards, a zipper compartment for cash and it still closes without a bulge. All this is great but what takes it to the next level is the incredible customer service, whoever runs this company knows what they are doing, insuring their customers are satisfied. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Helen GriffisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't quite fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it has 3 card slots and a place to put cash or receipts. The magnet is strong and holds it nicely closed. However, as much as I like this wallet case my phone doesn't fit in there right. The side with the volume and Bixby buttons doesn't allow the phone to fit into place. Because of this it makes it difficult to use these buttons and I find it extremely annoying. This case would be perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: jean e karpowich

customer_reviews.title: A Miracle
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the worst with phones! Cases never last, screen always cracks. Something about this case that has really added some time to his phone. 3 months later and no cracked screen, and leather still looks new. It's a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clean Inexpensive Case
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I dislike about this wallet case is that my phone does NOT shut down when the case is closed and does NOT come on when the case is opened. I must manually shut it down before closing up the case and manually turn it on after opening the case. Other than this, it is a great looking case that carries my cards.
customer_reviews.author: MC Cross

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby!
customer_reviews.text: Clean lines, nice feel... overall good quality! Only complaint is that I wish the locking flap was a little longer, (when you have to much cash, it's a bit hard to close the magnetic flap around the wallet). This is also due to the fact that bills must be folded to fit inside. Then again, if it was long enough to accomodate the full length of the bills, it would make the wallet an inch or so longer than the phone, which might be awkward. Oh well... I'll let the engineers figure that one out. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Hyde

customer_reviews.title: but I absolutely LOVE this phone case
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a wallet case before, but I absolutely LOVE this phone case. It fits my phone flawlessly. My phone is protected very well, and has three slots that will hold cards. It come in very handy on my quick trips to the store and gas station when I don't need to take my son's diaper bag. This case is very sturdy and it super cute! I will purchase again if this one ever wears out or is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Berry-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great product. Fots lots of cards and still closes
customer_reviews.text: Ships fast, great product. Fots lots of cards and still closes. Strong magnet that works when phone is flipped open as well. To adhere to other side. Flexible plastic that Keep a phone in place, less risk of cracking case or phone for that matter
customer_reviews.author: Torri

customer_reviews.title: If don't want your phone to break, get a wallet tipe case for your phone
customer_reviews.text: I like this case for my S8+ because protec the entire phone and it is slim and you can store a credit card or ID if u loke. You can stand it if u want to watch a show or anything . It has fallen from my hands and nothing has happened so far. I had another tipe of case that is not a wallet tipe and my phone fell once flat and nothing happened but another day fell on the corner and guess what happened...the screen cracked i had to pay 100 for my deductible. That is why i bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: herbert hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: Great Case!!! Fits phone perfectly and definitely good construction. I only gave 4 stars because the cover does not fully close with cards in the slot. They should have added one more card slot. There is enough room and that would have fixed my issue. I teamed the case up with Flip Case Control app from Google Play. That turns off my display every time the cover is closed and back on again when opened. (leave Device Administrator unchecked in app settings and you will not have to enter your password/pin every time you open the case).
customer_reviews.author: Gary Place

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Functional, and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet case has done the following: 1) Protected my phone from multiple drops from 4+ feet onto hard surfaces 2) Replaced my wallet 3) Looked good doing it I will definitely look for this brand in a wallet case format for my next phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon7Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and does fit well.....
customer_reviews.text: However, do not put credit cards or other things in the pockets. They may break your screen. They did on my phone. This thing will not protect your phone from damage 90% of the time. So don't ever drop your phone in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Westley

customer_reviews.title: It's just not a great product. The magnet isn't secure
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against the company. It's exactly as advertised and shipping was fast. It's just not a great product. The magnet isn't secure, the cards fit loosely and slide around, and it's pretty bulky. The s8 plus is a sexy, sleek phone and this case hides it. I really regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Dont put to many cards
customer_reviews.text: i really liked the feel and look of the cover however, i put to many cards on one slot and it stretched out and then i had to be careful that the cards didn't slip out of its pocket. otherwise this cover would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I think they are super tacky and look ridiculous when someone is just browsing ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of wallet style cases. I think they are super tacky and look ridiculous when someone is just browsing the internet from their wallet. However, my job is pretty labor intensive and I have the S8+ (There has yet to be a good glass screen protector due to the curved edges.) so I was at a loss for finding something to protect my phone. The phone can be placed in the rubber casing for this item very easily and quickly so I don't mind keeping my phone in it while at work, and out anywhere else. It has saved my phones screen multiple times. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hedenlan

customer_reviews.title: Nice case.
customer_reviews.text: The case feels really nice, and feels like it has a quality construction. The wireless charging still works even with the case on. The case looks very professional. My only complaints are that there isn't room for US sized monetary bills without folding them, and that it won't fit in my universal car mount holder anymore as the cover doesn't fold flat when it's folded behind the phone.
customer_reviews.author: W. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Made life easier and less (literally) painful.
customer_reviews.text: I was getting bad sciatica pain due to a thick wallet so I started looking for alternatives. This is perfect. When I first got this two months ago it could fit a couple of cards, that's about it but latch flap does relax some so now I can fit my ID and two credit cards in the slots and 4 shopping cards in the wallet part.
customer_reviews.author: David E. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it today. It seems like a great product. The wallet side folds back & is magnetized to opposite side which is helpful & comfortable for typing long reviews such as this. There are 3 wallet slots & a large slot posterior to slots, but if you over fill... it won't close properly. But, it works great so far, it's slender enough that I think it'll fit in my pocket. And there is a Lifetime warranty that came with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Buchmann

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it for or my galaxy 8plus the corners destroy ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it for or my galaxy 8plus the corners destroy my clear screen don't recommend unless you used without the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED IN PINK
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointed! All magnetic and doesn't increase the volume of your phone. Waste of money. I returned mine. Does not look like the picture at all.
customer_reviews.author: jersey

customer_reviews.title: Needs a stronger magnet to keep closed
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price. Wish it had a place for your license on the outside of the case, but I should have looked better at the photos. Really dislike the weak magnet for the closure. I only have a handful of credit cards in the inside flap, but the phone struggles to stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: momarketer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, great protection for Samsung S8 Plus.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. I had a rubber case on my phone with a screen protector but after the screen protector cracked from being crushed in my purse I decided I needed a more substantial case. This case is perfect for what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: CStonestreet

customer_reviews.title: Great case, could be better with slight upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I like this case, but would be a lot better if it had a separation panel between the phone screen and the card holder. The card side has left abrasions on my screen. This is the second case I have bought for my Galaxy phone. I had other case for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Great case for carrying multiple cards
customer_reviews.text: Great case for carrying multiple cards. The leather edge and flap has creases from being folded back constantly. The magnet flap that holds the case closed is very nice and feels good to use. One downside is there is no magnet between the plastic casing and the back of the leather to prevent it from flipping out. I would suggest doing what the Samsung Flip View cover does by placing a small magnet there. I also think there could have been one more credit card slot added but overall, this case is pretty sweet!
customer_reviews.author: yk

customer_reviews.title: Maxboost s8 plus wallet 👛.
customer_reviews.text: After a while to using it I try the fingerprints and it's so hard with this on and sometimes when I try to turn the phone from the right button I found it a little hard cause the strap that hold the cover on the phone is blocking it otherwise it's great protect.
customer_reviews.author: abu3mrh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but didn't work for me, I prefer the classic case so I don't have to open constantly the wet to check emails and messages
customer_reviews.author: alessandro prevedello

customer_reviews.title: Great & pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. Comes in great colors. Flap tuns back and holds in place with magnet. Feminine and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Phillips

customer_reviews.title: ... "wallet case" for my phone and I am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing a "wallet case" for my phone and I am very satisfied with it. My S8 fits perfectly! The credit card slots, the kickstand and the color are perfect! It's very well made, sturdy if you will, with a great magnetic clasp and wrist strap. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Westttttt_

customer_reviews.title: good case, but magnet closure on flap is ripping
customer_reviews.text: Good case overall for last couple of months, however the magnet that seals the case has caused a crease on the flap which is now slowly ripping. Tried leather glue but crease keeps forming, maybe get another month out if before I can't hack repair it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: AntJustAnt

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S8 Plus Wallet Case
customer_reviews.text: I Have a Galaxy S* + phone ... beware of what you get for the price. This case does not fit my phone. For the price, why send it back ... ? I will find something useful for it
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Hoffer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and stylish case!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent case for the price! Durable, great quality, and after many months of hard use, drops, and innumerable times of being stuffed in and out of pockets, I have to say this case is amazing. If you need a stylish case for your S8+ that also protects it well, get this.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Classy.
customer_reviews.text: Classy. It looks great, hasn't worn after quite a bit of use and I can charge through the case.
customer_reviews.author: Frisian

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: This case fits perfectly, is very well made and protects my phone. The clasp is magnetic and so far works very well. One thing - it's not easy to talk on the phone while it's in the case. No other issues, however it's only day two..
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Grams

customer_reviews.title: It does an a great job protecting my phone and I absolutely love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this case for a few weeks now, and I don't have any complaints. The case is ultra slim, and I prefer to just have 2 cards in the slots. It does an a great job protecting my phone and I absolutely love the magnetic closure.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad,loves it. Fits his cards just fine.
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: It's a case
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like it used it for 1 day then got outer box
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for all the functions
customer_reviews.text: Fits the phone perfect. Able to use the phone functions without a problem. Does not interfere with sound or the camera. Could use more pouches for cards other then that very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: OHGREATONE2

customer_reviews.title: I do like it seems to protect the phone but it would ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like it seems to protect the phone but it would have got a 5 star if the closing and holding magnet was a little stronger it does not always stay closed
customer_reviews.author: philip g

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and it protects my phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it protects my phone, which I was looking for since it is so hard to find a screen protector that stays on an s8 plus phone.
customer_reviews.author: IKE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect! Five cards and cash easily fit and close with no problem. The phone fits perfectly and sides are covered. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mslaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar case for my previous phone, and it's obvious that this case has better craftsmanship and is made from better materials. Especially for the price, I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Husband has had this a few months. Cards fall out now and it looks really worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Wallet S 8 Plus phone case on the market today..
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone cover, made extremely well, even with the phone in this case i was amazed that I could wireless charge the phone. And the stand option is awesome as well for watching Amazon Prime movies. I would definitely recommend this to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Hammertime

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain for the money it's good and it takes care of my investment which is my phone
customer_reviews.author: La Gata

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: This wallet style case has a nice look and appears to be pretty durable. I bought this to replace an existing wallet style case that was falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my S8
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my S8 so returned it for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: but it has to be put right on the sweet spot. With three cards plus 1 or 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: It does work with Yootech Qi wireless charger, but it has to be put right on the sweet spot. With three cards plus 1 or 2 paper bills the magnet still works. But you need to fold the bill otherwise it will likely block the four little holes. In general it's maybe the best in its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice case for a price. Nothing to complain. Fits S8 as advertised. Has inside pocket for credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Maxboost case and is has been wonderful. I've dropped my phone a number of times ...
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry when I bought my S8 Plus. Two days later, you guess it I dropped it. The screen was slightly cracked. Moving forward, I purchased the Maxboost case and is has been wonderful. I've dropped my phone a number of times since. The case has protected my phone. The wallet is great for me because I have all my cc and id with me when I travel. I would recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will hold up great!! You can put about 6 cards in holder & still close it.
customer_reviews.author: Tgreen

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality cover. I have had it for a couple months and it is still in great shape. Each slot can hold three cards. Money pouch is small so you have to fold the money up but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: The inside part that holds the phone is not plastic, it is a lot sturdy (rubber type) I had plastic in the past and naturally it broke After a while this seems like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Wise Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must need item for the casual and business professional. Looks great, good storage and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Otha Ulysses Bell, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Lived up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Owned the case for about 6 months. Minor wear and tear, but the case is holding well. Magnets aren't terribly strong, but keep the cover over the screen secure. The only issue I have is it can be difficult to make videos with one hand. As well not useful for carrying cash, but works for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Blu3Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet that holds a lot of cards
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet that holds a lot of cards. I've managed to stuff 8 cards, an employee badge and still have room for cash. It's really full but still able to close with all of these items in it.
customer_reviews.author: darren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, but could use a bigger magnet to help keep it closed
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case I've had
customer_reviews.text: Best phone case I've had. I drop my phone a lot, and the last case didn't protect it, and endured some cracking. With this case, my phone hasn't cracked anymore, despite it being even more delicate. I will buy another as the one I have wears down. It's been about 4 months already, and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: joline

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!!!!! Love it and have received so many compliments for the color. The functionality is perfect and it is not bulky at all. Protects my device more importantly!
customer_reviews.author: Uniquelyme

customer_reviews.title: Probably has 1 nanoTesla of magnetic strength (if that) and card pockets are too small and stiff.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute weakest, most pathetic, essentially nonexistent magnet I've ever seen. I've owned many wallet cases for my phones over the years, and this is by far the most disappointing. Highly suggest looking elsewhere. Fit and material feel and look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Soler

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is tempered glass friendly
customer_reviews.text: Although I have my doubts about this case cause I've had a made a lot of them. It actually turn out great I was worried About even if it would hold On a drop without damaging my phone but it Did. It's great is really great
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case
customer_reviews.text: This case works great. The cut out is perfect for the camera and sensors.
customer_reviews.author: FlatRonnie

customer_reviews.title: JUST DO IT
customer_reviews.text: Needed a case fast when the galaxy s8+ just came out and none of the main brands had them yet. I found this case and it had good reviews and i was just going to use till lifeproof came out with one. However i love this case and i decorated it with stickers and sparkles so its cuter now but the colors are already cute. Ive dropped it multiple times and not a scratch on it! Love this case will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alincia

customer_reviews.title: not a good case for galaxy s8plus
customer_reviews.text: It's not as I expected didn't like the look of it, but the closure magnets work well. It's not a good fit for the galaxy s8plus the buttons are partially covered so it's hard to use them. I threw it away and ordered a different case.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Jones

customer_reviews.title: Could use a thicker phone case inside the fold
customer_reviews.text: They are nice cases I guess only time will tell how they hold up but I thought that the case itself would be a little more substantial my wife likes to colors of hers but I work on a ship and I'm just worried about the all together protection of the phone
customer_reviews.author: Lance DeFazio

customer_reviews.title: Phone - Case - A Marriage in Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Great design...it pads your phone very well if it falls...I think a soft cover like leather is best for a phone In my opinion...
customer_reviews.author: scott hughes

customer_reviews.title: I didnt like it at all
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like it at all. When you fit 2 or 3 cards in there, it becomes bulky. The most uncomfortable thing is that "locking piece" on the right, it`s always on the way of your thumb and makes very bad experience for using phone. Material its made of looks and feel very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is very good. It looks very professional and the stand works well. The magnets snap into place nicely. I am recommending it to a friend who also got an S8+. It's definitely worth the price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: John Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great service. The leather gives it a very high quality look and feel!
customer_reviews.author: Casinobill

customer_reviews.title: Very durable case.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite cases. I keep my business cards in the slots and put the csses through a great deal of stress daily and they last for years. Very satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the overpriced version that you can buy at tmobile.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie B

customer_reviews.title: A satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I love the case that doubles as a wallet. It is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Hamer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Size and useful
customer_reviews.text: 8 plus phone fit properly Would like it in ted
customer_reviews.author: Mamalene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this case for a long time it has withstood all types of conditions and protected my phone throughout !!!!
customer_reviews.author: louduva

customer_reviews.title: Solid case. The weird thing is it doesnt fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid case. The weird thing is it doesnt fit dollar bills? Looked at tons of reviews and haven't seen anywhere it mentions this, so I'm assuming it's just a fluke. Tried fitting just one in there and it's just not long enough. Very odd..
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Randol

customer_reviews.title: I really like the S8+ case
customer_reviews.text: I really like the S8+ case. The stitching around the outside is a very nice touch to a solid leather case. Holds money and cards well plus phone fits perfectly, allowing me to reach all of the buttons easily. 5 stars and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this case because I am unable to put my charger into the port for charger nor am I able to connect the sound port without taking my phone out of the case, I should have to do this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Omkita

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Can fit up to 6 cards if you don't mind the bulkiness. I only need 4 so this case worked out great. It's sleek and professional looking as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case and it held my phone with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Cash doesnt fit well
customer_reviews.text: It's a great case. The only thing I dont like is that cash doesnt really fit without folding it, after which it doesnt really fully close
customer_reviews.author: Jason Emory Stanley

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT IN EVERY WAY!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as seen in pictures! Great quality! Nice kickstand feature, very stylish, couldn't ask for more - especially for that price! Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this case. It's easy to carry with the essentials to all the Flea Markets and Auctions she goes to.
customer_reviews.author: BLan65

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, and they have nice phone cases
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, and they have nice phone cases, this is not the first one we had bought, we have ordered from Maxboost in the past. So if your looking for a great case and are looking for different ones don't look any further!!! I'm sure you will find it here with Maxboost.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the case
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case. The only issue I have with it is the magnet isn't strong enough, especially if you have lots of cash or too many cards. I would buy this again if the magnet to close it was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Toni B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, functional phone case. This is my first time with a wallet style case and I can say I'm really happy with this purchase. So far it's held up pretty well. It also works with the glass screen protectors!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking case
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking case. Leather seems to be higher quality than most; I will keep an eye on it throughout use to watch for any peeling issues. Magnet closure is strong and fits nicely around the phone. Plastic phone holder fits S8+ snugly, though you may have an issue if you have a full body screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: minervamaga

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice case so far very happy with the design. Simple but Elegant!
customer_reviews.author: niaz sumon

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to your wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! No need to carry my wallet separately with case. I can carry all my cards in it and a little bit of cash. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking wallet phone case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice compared to my older case this is nice and compact enough to fit into my pocket
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the magnetic flap works both ways. Good buy for a cheap price
customer_reviews.author: Regi from cali

product_meta.title: Maxboost Galaxy S8 Plus Wallet Case [Folio Style] [Stand Feature] Samsung Galaxy S8+ / s8 Plus Card Case (2017) [Black] Premium Protective PU Leather Flip Cover w/Card Slot Side Pocket Magnetic
feature_bullets: [ONLY Compatible with Galaxy S8 plus / s8+ phone 2017] Stylish and Protective - Quality crafted PU Leather Galaxy S8 plus Wallet Case features multiple color options, as well as four corner and front and back protection.
Multi-functional - Perfect for on-the-go use, the Galaxy S8 plus card case features 3 card slots, a side pocket for money or additional cards, and a magnetic lock design.
Convenient to Use - Precise cutouts for speakers, camera and other functional ports allow you easy access to all ports and functions, without removing the case.
View from any Angle - The Maxboost wallet case can switch to a horizontal position and act as a stand; perfect for entertainment or streaming.
LIFETIME WARRANTY - from Maxboost to ensure the maximum protection for the life of your Galaxy s8+ / S8 plus Case Wallet.
